front.title: Laser Projector
front.gametext: Use 2 Force to deploy on an interior site. May target a seeker (use defense value = 1), character or creature for free. Draw destiny. Target hit if destiny -1 > defense value. Laser Projector may be targeted by any weapon (use defense value = 1).
front.lore: Laser system activated by distress signal from guards. Used at security checkpoints and detention block control rooms. Targeting guided by centralized droid controller.
